str2: Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Neuter of hieros; a sacred place, i.e. The entire precincts of the Temple.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A learner, disciple, pupil. From manthano; a learner, i.e. Pupil.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From pros and erchomai; to approach, i.e. come near, visit, or worship, assent to.
To show, display, point out, indicate; I prove, demonstrate. From epi and deiknuo; to exhibit.
Neuter of hieros; a sacred place, i.e. The entire precincts of the Temple.
Feminine of a compound of oikos and the base of doma; architecture, i.e. a structure; figuratively, confirmation.
